constituent: sticky, rice, fortune-telling, magic wand, augury, mouth
koohiiStory1: This is another way of fortune telling -- throw sticky rice against the wall, and look for the message in whatever sticks.
koohiiStory2: CONDI RICE was told by the FORTUNE TELLER that she will get STICKY...
myStory: chữ Niêm. dính, nhớt. gạo dự báo là dính. chữ mễ và chữ chiêm. mễ chiêm
words:
粘り(ねばり): stickyness, viscosity
粘る(ねばる): to be sticky, to be adhesive, to persevere, to persist, to stick to
